# Age Resistance, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 5]], [[7th Level Druid Spells|Druid 7]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Witch Spells|Witch 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 13]], [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Components:** V, S

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 24 hours

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 205

This spell functions as *[[Age Resistance, Lesser (Spell)|lesser age resistance]]*, except you ignore all Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution penalties gained from middle age, old age, and venerable age.
